bismillah: In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful
subtitle: Beloved Mothers & Grandmothers
message: Two beautiful souls, one from each side of our family, united by their unwavering faith and boundless love. Alaya, a devoted grandmother, and Soad, a cherished mother — both were pillars of strength who dedicated their lives to Islam, its teachings, and serving others.
qualities: Their homes were always open, their hearts always giving. They taught us the beauty of the Quran, the importance of prayer, and the joy of helping those in need. Their legacy of faith and compassion lives on through every story shared in this app.

dua.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُمَا وَارْحَمْهُمَا وَعَافِهِمَا وَاعْفُ عَنْهُمَا
dua.translation: O Allah, forgive them, have mercy upon them, give them peace, and pardon them

verse.translation: Indeed, to Allah we belong and to Him we shall return

appName: Alaya & Soad's Gift: Stories from Jannah
